This is a TREMENDOUS EXAMPLE of BUICK HERZOG, all-purpose inf-outf for the NY GIANTS. I see NO CREASES to warrant a VG grade! This card is WELL CENTERED w/ a CLEAR BLUE SKY bkgrnd & a SHARP IMAGE. It has BEAUTIFUL EYE APPEAL, well above grade given!
REDUCED TO $42.00 w/ $3.00 ship padded

(2) ADMIRAL SCHLEI-CATCHING SWEET CAP 150/649 OVERPRINT
Here's a BRILLIANT EXAMPLE of catcher ADMIRAL SCHLEI of the NY GIANTS. This is a PURE, SPOTLESS IMAGE, very CRISP & CLEAR w/ NICELY DEFINED CORNERS! The OVERPRINT area on reverse is NEATLY DONE! Thin, tiny crease lower left corner & another example that APPEARS BETTER than the grade it got! 
REDUCED TO $62.00 w/ $3.00 ship padded

Pymt via the usual--PPal F & F, MO, Personal ck.

You'll LOVE having these 2 in your Fine Collection!

I have reduced both cards well over 10-15%! 

Have a nice Easter Sunday!
You will be pleased w/ these 2 cards, I'm sure of it! Mid-week bump!
